item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description:
This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

Sensitivity and Specificity

When evaluating medical tests, several metrics are crucial for determining their effectiveness in correctly identifying the presence or absence of a disease. Hereâ€™s a quick rundown:

  • Sensitivity: This measures the proportion of people with the disease who test positive. High sensitivity is ideal for screening tests because it minimizes the chance of missing a person with the disease (low false negatives).
